title: Carly's cottage pie
ingredients: ['500g lean minced steak', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '250g swede and carrot', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', '300ml beef stock made with 1/2 stock cube', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '500g King Edwards potatoes, peeled and chopped', '500g sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped', '30ml milk', '1 tablespoon butter']
